languages.text: "Ты вернешься на арену Губительной жажды. Убьешь для меня парочку ведьминских выкормышей. Может даже пустишь кровь одному из Кровавых прозелитов". {n}Гемункул повелительно вещает, глядя мимо вас.{/n} "Им давно пора преподать небольшой урок смирения. Они зазнались, они не проявляют почтения, они не ценят, не уважают авторитет..." {n}Гипнотизируя взглядом пространство, ксенос с маниакальной дотошностью перечисляет ему свои поводы для недовольства.{/n}

"You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты вернешься на арену Губительной жажды. Убьешь для меня парочку ведьминских выкормышей. Может даже пустишь кровь одному из Кровавых прозелитов". {n}Гемункул повелительно вещает, глядя мимо вас.{/n} "Им давно пора преподать небольшой урок смирения. Они зазнались, они не проявляют почтения, они не ценят, не уважают авторитет..." {n}Гипнотизируя взглядом пространство, ксенос с маниакальной дотошностью перечисляет ему свои поводы для недовольства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus is looking past you as he gives his commanding speech.{/n} "They are long overdue for a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they show no respect, they do not appreciate my work, they do not recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring off into the distance, he continues to recount the reasons for his displeasure with maniacal fastidiousness.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Vous allez retourner dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale. Vous éliminerez quelques protégés des Cérastes pour moi. Vous pourrez même vous en prendre à l'un de ces Prosélytes sanglants. » {n}Le regard de l'hémoncule fait lointain alors qu'il déclame son discours.{/n} « Ils ont bien besoin d'une petite leçon d'humilité. Ils ont oublié leur place et ne respectent ni mon autorité ni mon travail... » {n}Les yeux toujours dans le vague, il continue à égrener ses doléances avec une précision démente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez retourner dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale. Vous éliminerez quelques protégés des Cérastes pour moi. Vous pourrez même vous en prendre à l'un de ces Prosélytes Entachés de sang. » {n}Le regard de l'hémoncule fait lointain alors qu'il déclame son discours.{/n} « Ils ont bien besoin d'une petite leçon d'humilité. Ils ont oublié leur place et ne respectent ni mon autorité ni mon travail... » {n}Les yeux toujours dans le vague, il continue à égrener ses doléances avec une précision démente.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “我要你回到‘致命饥渴’，替我杀掉几个巫灵教会的成员。就算你打算拿血腥叛党的成员开刀，估计也不要紧。”{n}血伶人一边看着你，一边发表着他那咄咄逼人的演说。{/n}“他们早就该上一堂关于谦卑的小小课程了。他们已经忘记了自己的位置，他们缺乏尊重的态度，不欣赏我的作品，也不承认我的权威……”{n}他的目光依然凝视着远方，继续滔滔不绝地罗列他的不满。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我要你回到‘致命饥渴’，替我杀掉几个巫灵教会的成员。就算你打算拿血腥叛党的成员开刀，估计也不要紧。”{n}血伶人一边看着你，一边发表着他那咄咄逼人的演说。{/n}“他们早就该上一堂关于谦卑的小小课程了。他们已经忘记了自己的位置，他们缺乏尊重的态度，不欣赏我的作品，也不承认我的权威……”{n}他的目光依然凝视着远方，继续滔滔不绝地罗列他的不满。{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Ihr werdet zur Arena des Fatalen Dursts zurückkehren. Ihr werdet für mich einige der Zöglinge der Hekatari töten. Vielleicht vergießt Ihr sogar das Blut eines der Blutbefleckten Proselyten." {n}Der Haemonculus blickt während seiner gebieterischen Rede an dir vorbei.{/n} "Es ist längst überfällig, dass ihnen eine kleine Lektion in Demut erteilt wird. Sie haben ihren Platz vergessen, sie haben keinen Respekt, sie wissen meine Arbeit nicht zu schätzen, sie erkennen meine Autorität nicht an ..." {n}Während er weiterhin in die Ferne starrt, zählt er mit manischer Gründlichkeit seine Beschwerden auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet zur Arena des Fatalen Dursts zurückkehren. Ihr werdet für mich einige der Zöglinge der Hekatari töten. Vielleicht vergießt Ihr sogar das Blut eines der Blutbefleckten Proselyten." {n}Der Haemonculus blickt während seiner gebieterischen Rede an dir vorbei.{/n} "Es ist längst überfällig, dass ihnen eine kleine Lektion in Demut erteilt wird. Sie haben ihren Platz vergessen, sie haben keinen Respekt, sie wissen meine Arbeit nicht zu schätzen, sie erkennen meine Autorität nicht an ..." {n}Während er weiterhin in die Ferne starrt, zählt er mit manischer Gründlichkeit seine Beschwerden auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Volverás a la arena de la Sed Letal. Matarás a algunos esbirros de las brujas. También es posible que derrames la sangre de un prosélito ensangrentado». {n}El Hemónculo mira al infinito mientras pronuncia su arrogante discurso.{/n} «No les vendría mal una lección de humildad. Han olvidado de dónde vienen, han perdido el respeto, no aprecian mi trabajo, no me reconocen como su líder...». {n}Todavía con la mirada perdida, sigue manifestando sus quejas con una precisión obsesiva.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Volverás a la arena de la Sed Letal. Matarás a algunos esbirros de las brujas. También es posible que derrames la sangre de un prosélito ensangrentado». {n}El Hemónculo mira al infinito mientras pronuncia su arrogante discurso.{/n} «No les vendría mal una lección de humildad. Han olvidado de dónde vienen, han perdido el respeto, no aprecian mi trabajo, no me reconocen como su líder...». {n}Todavía con la mirada perdida, sigue manifestando sus quejas con una precisión obsesiva.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「お前は“宿命の渇き”のアリーナに戻るのだ。そしてウィッチの養子を何人か殺すのだ。血まみれの改宗者の血を流すこともできるだろう」{n}ハモンキュラスは威厳のあるスピーチをしながら、あなたを見送る。ヘモンクルスは漫然としたスピーチをしながら、あなたを見送っている。{/n}「彼らは、もうずっと前に謙虚さについての小さな教訓を受けるべきだったのだ。自分の立場を忘れ、敬意を欠き、私の仕事を評価せず、さらにはその権威を認めようとしない…」{n}それでも彼は遠くを見つめながら、狂ったように徹底的に不満を列挙し続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は“宿命の渇き”のアリーナに戻るのだ。そしてウィッチの養子を何人か殺すのだ。血まみれの改宗者の血を流すこともできるだろう」{n}ハモンキュラスは威厳のあるスピーチをしながら、あなたを見送る。ヘモンクルスは漫然としたスピーチをしながら、あなたを見送っている。{/n}「彼らは、もうずっと前に謙虚さについての小さな教訓を受けるべきだったのだ。自分の立場を忘れ、敬意を欠き、私の仕事を評価せず、さらにはその権威を認めようとしない…」{n}それでも彼は遠くを見つめながら、狂ったように徹底的に不満を列挙し続ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Ölüme Susamışlığın Arenası'na geri döneceksin. Benim için Viçlerin birkaç evlatlığını öldüreceksin. Kızıl Zındıklar'dan birinin kanını bile dökebilirsin." {n}Haimonkulus, konuşurken sana değil de arkana bakıyor.{/n} "Mütevazılık konusunda küçük bir ders almalarının zamanı geldi de geçiyor. Hadlerini bilmemeye, saygısızlık yapmaya, çalışmalarımı önemsememeye, yetkimi tanımamaya başladılar." {n}Hâlâ uzaklara bakar hâldeyken memnuniyetsizliklerini aşırı bir detaycılıkla sıralıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will return to the arena of the Fatal Thirst. You will kill a few of the Wyches' fosterlings for me. You might even spill the blood of one of the Bloodstained Proselytes." {n}The Haemonculus looks past you as he delivers his imperious speech.{/n} "They are long overdue a small lesson in humility. They have forgotten their place, they lack respect, they do not appreciate my work, they fail to recognise my authority..." {n}Still staring into the distance, he continues to list his grievances with maniacal thoroughness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ölüme Susamışlık'ın arenasına geri döneceksin. Benim için Viçlerin birkaç evlatlığını öldüreceksin. Kızıl Zındıklardan birinin kanını bile dökebilirsin." {n}Haimonkulus konuşurken sana değil de arkana doğru bakıyor.{/n} "Mütevazılık konusunda küçük bir ders almalarının zamanı geldi de geçiyor. Hadlerini bilmemeye, saygısızlık yapmaya, çalışmalarımın değerini algılayamamaya, yetkimi tanımamaya başladılar." {n}Hâlâ uzaklara bakar hâldeyken memnuniyetsizliklerini manyakça bir detaycılıkla sıralıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
